description.english: Get at least an S on all Ayakashi Fuuji difficulties on at least 1.0x speed

description.turkish: (A) En az 9 başka oyuncuyla bir odada çok oyunculu oyun oyna
description.brazilian: (A) Jogue um jogo multiplayer em uma sala com pelo menos 9 outros jogadores
description.latam: (A)Juega un juego multijugador en una sala con al menos 9 otros jugadores

description.english: Win a multiplayer game in a lobby with at least 3 other players
description.german: (A) Gewinne ein Multiplayer-Spiel in einer Lobby mit mindestens 3 anderen Spielern
description.french: (A) Gagnez un jeu multijoueur dans un lobby avec au moins 3 autres joueurs
description.koreana: (A) 다른 플레이어 최소 3명이 있는 로비에서 멀티플레이 게임 승리하기
description.schinese: (A)在至少有3名其他玩家的大厅中赢得多人游戏
description.tchinese: (A) 在至少有3名其他玩家的大廳中贏得一場多人遊戲
description.russian: (A) Выиграй мультиплеерную игру в лобби хотя бы с 3 другими игроками
description.japanese: (A) 他のプレイヤーが少なくとも3人いるロビーでマルチプレイゲームに勝利
description.finnish: (A) Voita moninpeli lobbyssa, jossa on vähintään 3 muuta pelaajaa
description.romanian: (A) Câștigă un joc multiplayer într-un lobby cu cel puțin 3 alți jucători

description.brazilian: (A) Ganhe um jogo multiplayer em um lobby com pelo menos 3 outros jogadores
description.latam: (A)Gana un juego multijugador en un lobby con al menos 3 otros jugadores

description.english: I guess they'll just go back to working on the game...
description.german: (A) Ich denke, sie werden einfach zurückgehen und am Spiel arbeiten...
description.french: (A) Je suppose qu'ils vont juste retourner travailler sur le jeu...
description.koreana: (A) 게임 개발에 다시 돌아가나 보네요...
description.schinese: (A)我猜他们只是回去继续开发游戏了...
description.tchinese: (A) 我猜他們只會回去繼續開發遊戲...
description.russian: (A) Наверное, они просто вернутся к работе над игрой...
description.japanese: (A) 彼らはゲームの開発に戻るだろう…
description.finnish: (A) Arvatenkin he palaavat takaisin työstämään peliä...
description.romanian: (A) Cred că se vor întoarce la lucrul la joc...
description.turkish: (A) Sanırım oyun üzerinde çalışmaya geri dönecekler...
description.brazilian: (A) Acho que eles vão voltar a trabalhar no jogo...
description.latam: (A)Supongo que simplemente volverán a trabajar en el juego...
